titleStmt.title: A Poem on the Italian woman lately come into England; who sings at the musick-house in York-buildings.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ronald Taylor in Stationers-Yard.,

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 1554:8 incorrectly identified as Wing P2697.
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and Cambridge University Library.
